column4: So, how can a guy find out where Ubuntu needs volunteers and help out?
Yeah I watch some of the lists (not the dev list though)
But no one is saying we need people here, here and here.
I coded an ftp client mostly while loaded, was not good :D
it depends on which country/state your living in
I am referring to the country I am most familiar with, USA.
I am from Canda and things are much different
Oh yes, I know about the CD thing there.
But lets not get into that ;)
I would imagine the scripts are available somewhere
If you find them I might be willing to host it...
